title: eBay-Planet
author: eBay-Planet
content: Hello,Nice to be here!eBay-Planet offers to buy you anything ( except digital ) from eBay USA at rates from 20-30% off! depending on the items, Shipping to USA address only, We soon will include UK eBay ( If we succeed ). Deals must include Escrow & Escrow fees on you & must be trusted.Let`s say how you can start a deal with us.Go to eBay and choose what you would like to buy,- Minimum deal price 400$ your total order price from 400$ to maximum of 1200$ per order. Order can includes multiple items.- Prepare your trusted Escrow - I will verify the escrow.- Provide your Name - Shipping address ( Taxes on address will be added to the total of your order ).- You need to choose brand new items from top sellers only with the fastest delivery available ( Same day or 2 Days shipping ).Tat : 2 - 4 days.  - We can refuse buying some items or dealing with you.  - You are not covered by money back or returns you need to wisely choose the seller and items.Contact infoYou can give me your contact info until I know if I am allowed to add my contact info here.Best regards.
